verses.verse: Is there <S%H3808>not<s%> an appointed <S%H6635>time<s%> to <S%H582>man<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H776>earth?<s%> are not his <S%H3117>days<s%> also like the <S%H3117>days<s%> of a <S%H7916>hireling?<s%>
As a <S%H5650>servant<s%> earnestly <S%H7602>desireth<s%> the <S%H6738>shadow,<s%> and as a <S%H7916>hireling<s%> looketh <S%H6960>for<s%> the reward of his work: <S%H6467><s%>
So <S%H3651><s%> am I made to <S%H5157>possess<s%> <S%H3391>months<s%> of <S%H7723>vanity,<s%> and <S%H5999>wearisome<s%> <S%H3915>nights<s%> are <S%H4487>appointed<s%> to me.

When <S%H518><s%> I lie <S%H7901>down,<s%> I <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H4970>When<s%> shall I <S%H6965>arise,<s%> and the <S%H6153>night<s%> be <S%H4059>gone?<s%> and I am <S%H7646>full<s%> of tossings to and <S%H5076>fro<s%> <S%H5704>unto<s%> the dawning of the <S%H5399>day.<s%>
My <S%H1320>flesh<s%> is <S%H3847>clothed<s%> with <S%H7415>worms<s%> and <S%H1487>clods<s%> of <S%H6083>dust;<s%> my <S%H5785>skin<s%> is <S%H7280>broken,<s%> and become <S%H3988>loathsome.<s%>
My <S%H3117>days<s%> are <S%H7043>swifter<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> a weaver's <S%H708>shuttle,<s%> and are <S%H3615>spent<s%> <S%H657>without<s%> <S%H8615>hope.<s%>
O <S%H2142>remember<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> my <S%H2416>life<s%> is <S%H7307>wind:<s%> mine <S%H5869>eye<s%> shall <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H7725>more<s%> <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H2896>good.<s%>
The <S%H5869>eye<s%> of him that hath <S%H7210>seen<s%> me shall <S%H7789>see<s%> me <S%H3808>no<s%> more: thine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> are upon me, and I am <S%H369>not.<s%>

As the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> is <S%H3615>consumed<s%> and vanisheth <S%H1980>away:<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> he that goeth <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H7585>grave<s%> shall come <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> more.
He shall <S%H7725>return<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more<s%> to his <S%H1004>house,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall his <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H5234>know<s%> him any <S%H5750>more.<s%>

Therefore <S%H1571><s%> <S%H589>I<s%> will <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H2820>refrain<s%> my <S%H6310>mouth;<s%> I will <S%H1696>speak<s%> in the <S%H6862>anguish<s%> of my <S%H7307>spirit;<s%> I will <S%H7878>complain<s%> in the <S%H4751>bitterness<s%> of my <S%H5315>soul.<s%>
Am <S%H589>I<s%> a <S%H3220>sea,<s%> <S%H518>or<s%> a <S%H8577>whale,<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> thou <S%H7760>settest<s%> a <S%H4929>watch<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> me?
When <S%H3588><s%> I <S%H559>say,<s%> My <S%H6210>bed<s%> shall <S%H5162>comfort<s%> me, my <S%H4904>couch<s%> shall <S%H5375>ease<s%> my <S%H7879>complaint;<s%>
Then thou <S%H2865>scarest<s%> me with <S%H2472>dreams,<s%> and <S%H1204>terrifiest<s%> me through <S%H4480>visions:<s%> <S%H2384><s%>
So that my <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H977>chooseth<s%> <S%H4267>strangling,<s%> and <S%H4194>death<s%> rather than my <S%H4480>life.<s%> <S%H6106><s%>
I <S%H3988>loathe<s%> it; I would <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H2421>live<s%> <S%H5769>always:<s%> let me <S%H2308>alone;<s%> <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> my <S%H3117>days<s%> are <S%H1892>vanity.<s%>
What <S%H4100><s%> is <S%H582>man,<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> thou shouldest <S%H1431>magnify<s%> him? and <S%H3588>that<s%> thou shouldest <S%H7896>set<s%> thine <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H413>upon<s%> him?
And that thou shouldest <S%H6485>visit<s%> him every <S%H1242>morning,<s%> and <S%H974>try<s%> him every <S%H7281>moment?<s%>

How <S%H4100>long<s%> wilt thou <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H8159>depart<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> me, <S%H3808>nor<s%> let me <S%H7503>alone<s%> <S%H5704>till<s%> I swallow <S%H1104>down<s%> my <S%H7536>spittle?<s%>

I have <S%H2398>sinned;<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> shall I <S%H6466>do<s%> unto thee, O thou <S%H5341>preserver<s%> of <S%H120>men?<s%> <S%H4100>why<s%> hast thou <S%H7760>set<s%> me as a <S%H4645>mark<s%> against thee, so that I <S%H1861>am<s%> a <S%H4853>burden<s%> <S%H5921>to<s%> myself?

And <S%H4100>why<s%> dost thou <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5375>pardon<s%> my <S%H6588>transgression,<s%> and take <S%H5674>away<s%> <S%H853><s%> mine <S%H5771>iniquity?<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H6258>now<s%> shall I <S%H7901>sleep<s%> in the <S%H6083>dust;<s%> and thou shalt seek me in the <S%H7836>morning,<s%> but I shall <S%H369>not<s%> be.
